title: Escape the Haunted Theatre
goal: Recover the spotlight crystal and lift the theatre's curse

rooms.name: Backstage Dressing Room
rooms.description: An old dressing room with cracked mirrors and dusty lights. A faint violin echoes in the distance.

items.name: torn script page
items.description: A torn script page hinting at the number of acts.
items.text: The final cue is lit by the number of acts… Our beloved show ran for three.

items.name: locked wardrobe
items.description: A wardrobe with a comedy-mask-shaped keyhole.

items.name: brass key
items.description: A key shaped like a comedy mask.

items.name: audience clue
items.description: A note referencing forgotten audience seats.
items.text: The spotlight crystal lies where the applause never ends—in the seats of the forgotten audience.

items.name: exit to stage
items.description: A hallway leading west to the Main Stage.

rooms.name: Main Stage
rooms.description: A dusty, decaying stage with rows of empty seats stretching into the dark.

items.name: attendance record book
items.description: A record book with Seat A5 circled.
items.text: Seat A5: Lost item reported by usher.

items.name: Seat A5
items.description: A dusty seat with a loose cushion.

items.name: Spotlight Crystal
items.description: A radiant crystal used to power the stage spotlight.

items.name: door to balcony
items.description: A creaking door leading south to the Phantom Balcony.

rooms.name: Phantom Balcony
rooms.description: A dim balcony overlooking the theatre. A ghostly figure sits at the railing.

items.name: theatre phantom
items.description: A ghost asking a single question.

password_questions.question: How many acts were in the final show?

rooms.win_message: The theatre lights blaze to life one last time as the curse lifts. You escape the haunted stage forever. You win!
